original_text: Then you replied, “We have sinned against the Lord. We will go up and fight, as the Lord our God commanded us.” So every one of you put on his weapons, thinking it easy to go up into the hill country.
korean_text: 너희가 대답하여 내게 이르기를 우리가 여호와께 범죄하였사오니 우리 하나님께서 우리에게 명령하신 대로 우리가 올라가서 싸우리이다 하고 너희가 각각 무기를 가지고 경솔히 산지로 올라가려 할 때에

sentences.original_text: We have sinned against the Lord
We will go up and fight
as the Lord our God commanded us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님 주께서 우리에게 명령하신 대로

sentences.original_text: So every one of you put on his weapons
thinking it easy to go up into the hill country
